Package IP.TodoListApplication.DataSorting

Class DateSorting

java.lang.Object
IP.TodoListApplication.Features.Actions
IP.TodoListApplication.DataSorting.DateSorting
public class DateSorting
extends Actions
This class is part of the TodoList application. DateSorting holds all methods and functions to sort tasks by their due date
Version:
2020.10.24
Author:
Sif Aldin Abbas

    • executeAction

      public void executeAction​(java.lang.String command)
      In this overridden method resides the implementation to compare our tasks and sort them according to their date value

      then our map will be cleared, sorted data will be inserted and a message confirming the completion of tast to the user will be printed

      Specified by:
      executeAction in class Actions
      Parameters:
      command - command to look up

    • isDateValid

      public static boolean isDateValid​(java.lang.String format, java.lang.String value)
      isDateValid confirms the validity of the inserted date by creating Local Date and parsing it then formatting it to the pattern inserted in the method parameter
      Parameters:
      format - correct format of the date
      value - value that equals the component in the task format
      Returns:
      result result as a boolean expression

    • convertDateToString

      public static java.lang.String convertDateToString​(java.time.LocalDate date, java.lang.String format)

      Parameters:
      date - due date
      format - date format pattern
      Returns:
      date as a string

    • parseDate

      public static java.time.LocalDate parseDate​(java.lang.String format, java.lang.String value)
      parseDate parses a string representation of the given date for it to be used in adding tasks
      Parameters:
      format - date format pattern
      value - value that equals the component in the task format
      Returns:
      localDate as a parsed string of the given date
